title: Who sings lead vocals on 'Take It to the Limit'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Randy Meisner sings the lead vocals on "Take It to the Limit." He was the bass player in the original line up of Eagles musicians. Randy left the band after disputes with Glenn Frey and Don Henley escalated. He was replaced by Timothy B. Schmidt, who also had a high, gentle tenor voice.
Randy Meisner ( bass player)….. the Eagles first number one song. And to much disrespect to Mr. Meisner..he was not invited to take part in an eagles reunion and tour following that.
